description: Clothing designed for multi-purpose use is sustainable design. Combining minimalist design and function, Ørnakken Man Tee is suitable for demanding mountain hikes, as well as for everyday use. Made from a combination of Merino wool and the natural material Tencel, Ørnakken Forest Man Tee is thermo-regulating and moisture wicking, and keeps you cool when it's hot, and warm in cooler weather. Super soft, lightweight and comfortable.
name: Devold Ornakken Forest Tee - Mens
